metadata.subject: Mathematics
metadata.curriculumTopic: Number and Algebra, Measurement and Geometry, Statistics and Probability
metadata.curriculumSubtopic: Multiplication/division facts, fractions/decimals, ratios, perimeter/area/volume, angles, coordinate systems, data analysis

questions.question: Calculate 3.75 + 2.86
questions.explanation: Align decimal places: 3.75 + 2.86. Add hundredths: 5 + 6 = 11 (write 1, carry 1). Add tenths: 7 + 8 + 1 = 16 (write 6, carry 1). Add units: 3 + 2 + 1 = 6. Result: 6.61
